article.headline: Villanova 66, MD Baltimore Co 41
article.story: VILLANOVA, Pa. (AP) -- Allan Ray scored 17 of his game-high 23 points in the first half as Villanova built a big lead early on the way to a 66-41 victory over UMBC on Tuesday night. Randy Foye netted 16 for the Wildcats, who made 10 of 24 shots from 3-point range. Ray (5-for-7) and Foye (4-for-7) combined for nine of the Wildcats' 3-pointers. Curtis Sumpter added 14 points and six rebounds and Mike Nardi had 10 assists for Villanova (1-0). Andrew Feeley scored 12 points to lead UMBC (1-1), which shot just 32 percent in the opening 20 minutes and committed six turnovers to fall into a 25-point halftime deficit. Villanova scored the first 10 points of the game on dunks by Sumpter and Foye and a pair of 3-pointers by Ray. Foye's third 3-pointer put the Wildcats comfortably in front, 33-11, with 4:52 remaining in the opening half. Ray hit 5-of-6 from beyond the arc in the first half and the Wildcats went to the locker room with a 41-16 advantage. The Wildcats used an 11-2 run to open a 34-point cushion midway through the second half and cruised to the easy victory. Villanova, which won the only previous meeting between the schools, 72-60, in 2002, has lost once in 19 home openers since the Pavilion opened in 1986. The Wildcats' only loss came against Seton Hall in 1991.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
